Elements from Json
-------------------

This creates a new .tosc template from scratch, then creates a new GROUP Node with n FADER children and gives them Properties from the .json file.

.. literalinclude:: 3-from-json.py
    :language: python


**Demo Files:**

- `Json Input <https://github.com/AlbertoV5/tosclib/blob/main/demos/files/Pro-C%202%20(FabFilter).json>`_
- `Output .tosc <https://github.com/AlbertoV5/tosclib/blob/main/demos/files/newTemplate.tosc>`_
